message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to part with it for a price of $800000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $600000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $700000. What do you think?

Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $650000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $650000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $675000. This is my final offer. What do you think?

Thank you for the final offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, so I'm offering $670000. This is my final offer. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any higher than my previous offer. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $680000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
